recent_commits.message: feat: Upgrade CSX testing infrastructure

context.summary:
Preview (start):
name: CSX Exploratory Tests

on:
  push:
    paths:
      - "tools/explore/*.csx"
      - "src/**/*.cs"
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  csx:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    defaults:
      run:
        working-directory: tools/explore

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Build Solution
Preview (end):
ools/explore

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Build Solution
        run: dotnet build -c Debug

      - name: Run CSX Tests
        run: |
          docker build -t csx-runner -f ../../docker/Dockerfile.csx-tests ..
          for script in *.csx; do
            echo "Running $script"
            docker run --rm \
              -v "$(pwd)/../..":/src \
              -v "$(pwd)":/app \
              -w /app \
              csx-runner "$script" || exit 1
          done

context.summary:
Preview (start):
# docker/Dockerfile.csx-tests
FROM mcr.microsoft.com/dotnet/sdk:9.0 AS base

# === Environment ===
ARG DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT=1
ARG DOTNET_NOLOGO=1
ENV DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT=${DOTNET_CLI_TELEMETRY_OPTOUT}
ENV DOTNET_NOLOGO=${DOTNET_NOLOGO}
ENV PATH="$PATH:/root/.dotnet/tools"

WORKDIR /app

# === Install dotnet-script (cached layer) ===
RUN dotnet tool install -g dotnet-script \
    && dotnet nuget locals all --clear

# === Pre-cache common NuGet packages for CSX tests ===
# Set the N
Preview (end):
# Verify cache directory exists and has packages
RUN ls -la /tmp/csharp-mcp-packages && echo "NuGet cache populated successfully"

# === Runtime Stage ===
FROM base AS runtime

# Optional: Add non-root user
# RUN adduser --disabled-password --gecos '' csxuser
# USER csxuser
# WORKDIR /home/csxuser/app

# Copy nothing — use volume mounts
VOLUME ["/app", "/src"]

# Health check
HEALTHCHECK CMD dotnet script --version || exit 1

# Flexible entrypoint
ENTRYPOINT ["dotnet", "script"]
CMD ["--help"]

-- Link BudgetEntries to MunicipalAccounts based on AccountNumber
UPDATE be
SET be.MunicipalAccountId = ma.Id
FROM BudgetEntries be
INNER JOIN MunicipalAccounts ma ON be.AccountNumber = ma.AccountNumber
WHERE be.MunicipalAccountId IS NULL;

- Background: Company brand colors

- Include loading animation if possibl

context.summary:
Preview (start):
#!/bin/sh
set -e
# Create symlinks from /src/src/* -> /src/* so old relative references work
for d in /src/src/*; do
  name=$(basename "$d")
  [ -e "/src/$name" ] && continue
  ln -s "$d" "/src/$name" || true
done

ls -la /src | sed -n '1,80p'

echo '--- now running script ---'
exec dotnet script /app/quickbooks-service.csx
